house_listing.house_description: VERY NICE HOME ON APPROX. 100 FEET OF GREAT OPEN WATERFRONT ON COVE OF LAKE LBJ. THIS IS A TWO STORY HOME WITH TWO BEDROOMS AND ONE BATH UP AND THE LOWER LEVEL READY TO COMPLETE TO FIT YOUR REQUIREMENTS. THERE IS A LARGE LOT WITH TREES, A BOATDOCK AND LIFT AND A SITTING AREA FOR FISHING OR SUNBATHING. YOU CAN RE READY TO ENJOY THE SUMMER IN THIS GREAT GETAWAY IF YOU ACT NOW.
